description: Gentle stretches for the lower body to do during your workday

exercise.description: Stretch calf while leaning on wall

instructions.text: Stand in stride stance with hand on wall, front knee bent, and affected leg straight and behind you .
Lean forward placing weight in hands and front foot keeping back heel down.
You should feel a stretch in your calf that extends up near the back of your knee.

exercise.name: Stretch Ankle Dorsiflexion (flexion)

instructions.text: Start standing.
Bend one knee bringing heel toward buttock, grasp ankle with same side hand and gently pull until a stretch is felt in the front of the thigh.
You should feel a stretch in your quad.
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, place your palms on the low back with fingers pointed down.
Press your hips forward and begin to arch the torso backwards.
Keep the head looking forward, or if it feels safe, let it drop all the way back and look up at the sky.
Hold for 10 seconds then slowly inhale as you come back to center.
You should feel a stretch in your abs.
Stand up straight with your arms at your sides and your feet shoulder width apart.
Bend your trunk to the right side by lowering your shoulder, and slide your hand down the outside of your thigh, right arm overhead.
Hold for five seconds.
Return to center.

alternative_names.text: lunge half kneeling hip flexor stretch

instructions.text: Begin kneeling.
Extend one knee behind you extending the hip until a stretch is felt in the front of the extended hip.
After 30 seconds return to starting position.
Keep both hips facing forward, kneel on a yoga mat or pillow if painful for knees.
On the stepping leg, you should feel this in your quads and glutes. On the backwards leg, you should feel a stretch at the front of your hip.
Start sitting tall in a chair.
Roll backwards over your sit bones into a slouching position.
Return to the start position and repeat.

exercise.description: Cross one leg over the other

instructions.text: Begin standing with one leg crossed over the other.
Bend forward at the hips until a stretch is felt in the sides and back of the legs.
After 30 seconds return to start position.
Keep back straight as you bend forward at the waist.
You should feel a stretch in the hamstrings of your back leg.

exercise.name: Stretch Hip Adduction

instructions.text: Stand up straight with your arms at your sides and your feet shoulder width apart.
Bend your trunk to the left side by lowering your shoulder, and slide your hand down the outside of your thigh and right arm overhead.
Hold for five seconds.
Return to center.

name: Office Friendly Lower Quarter Stretches
